meta_title: Equipment Reliability: A CFO's Guide to Boosting EBITDA
meta_description: Unlock the financial power of equipment reliability. Learn how to translate metrics like MTBF and OEE into profit and build a world-class maintenance strategy
title: Beyond the Wrench: A 2025 Guide to Equipment Reliability and Its Impact on Your Bottom Line

hero_image.alt: Hero image for Beyond the Wrench: A 2025 Guide to Equipment Reliability and Its Impact on Your Bottom Line

image_prompt: A photorealistic, wide-angle shot inside a clean, modern manufacturing facility. In the foreground, a diverse team of three maintenance professionals—a Black woman with her hair in a net, a Hispanic man, and an Asian man—are gathered around a large industrial robot arm. They are all wearing safety glasses and high-visibility vests over their work uniforms. The woman is pointing at a tablet she is holding, which displays a graph with sensor data. The two men are looking intently at the tablet and the robot arm, engaged in a collaborative discussion. The background is slightly blurred, showing automated conveyor belts and other advanced machinery, conveying a sense of high-tech operations and data-driven maintenance. The lighting is bright and professional. No text on the image.
